{"id":931644986,"question_id":2668,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681184136,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931644986/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Form Smallest Number From Two Digit Arrays","memory":"40.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minNumber(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums1);\n        Arrays.sort(nums2);\n        \n        HashSet<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        for(int n1 : nums1){\n            set.add(n1);\n        }\n        \n        for(int n2: nums2){\n            if(set.contains(n2))\n                return n2;\n        }\n        \n        return nums1[0]*10 +nums2[0] < nums2[0]*10 +nums1[0] ? nums1[0]*10 +nums2[0] : nums2[0]*10 +nums1[0];\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"form-smallest-number-from-two-digit-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
